Hero.description: Specializing in Laravel, Vue 3, React, and Next.js. I build scalable SaaS platforms and revenue-driven applications.

About.title: About Me
About.description:
I’m Azzeddine Fejri, a Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer specializing in Laravel, Vue 3, React, and Next.js, with strong experience building scalable SaaS platforms, multi-tenant systems, and business-critical applications.

I combine clean architecture, high-performance back-end systems, and modern front-end experiences to deliver products that are not only technically solid, but also revenue-driven and user-focused.

saas.title: End-to-End SaaS
saas.desc: Design & build platforms from DB to UI/UX.

values: I think product first, not just code
I write maintainable code that teams can evolve
I lead initiatives and work independently

achievements: Built a large-scale multi-tenant e-commerce platform for sellers
Developed seller & admin dashboards with Vue 3 and Laravel
Implemented Stripe subscriptions, feature-based pricing, and wallets
Designed a drag-and-drop page builder for product pages
Integrated traffic tracking & conversion APIs (Meta, TikTok)
Led codebase refactoring using SOLID principles
Introduced Node.js microservices for AI-powered features
Built CRM and appointment systems for doctors
Developed real-time scheduling with FullCalendar & Socket.IO
Integrated email and SMS notification services
Worked in Agile environment with Jira
Developed web interfaces for camera management
Integrated computer vision APIs for real-time analysis
Optimized database performance for large datasets

saas.title: SaaS Billing & Usage Platform
saas.description: A high-performance billing system handling metered usage, subscriptions, and invoicing for enterprise clients.
saas.features: Real-time usage tracking, Invoice generation, Tiered pricing logic

kanban.title: Real-time Kanban System
kanban.description: Collaborative project management tool with live updates, drag-and-drop interface, and SLA tracking.
kanban.features: WebSockets updates, Drag & Drop, Team permissions, Activity logs

booking.title: Multi-Provider Booking App
booking.description: A complex scheduling platform allowing users to book appointments with multiple service providers across different timezones.
booking.features: Timezone handling, Double-booking prevention, Calendar sync

marketplace.title: B2B RFQ Marketplace
marketplace.description: A trading platform connecting suppliers and buyers with a Request for Quote system and negotiation flow.
marketplace.features: RFQ Workflow, Chat system, Supplier verification, Admin panel

Contact.title: Let's Work Together
Contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your visions.
